CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 30, 1954, pg. 1, reads: "Homeless - Mrs. Elizabeth Richburg was among those who lost their possessions when a fire left seven families homeless last Saturday morning in 1500 block of North Murtland. Mrs. Richburg has moved temporarily with friends in the Hill District. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Elizabeth Richburg wearing dark jacket with two buttons descending from shoulder, posed in Harris Studio after losing her Homewood row house to fire on North Murtland Street
